Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: "Stop! Don't come any closer!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pursued by the bionics, Evan falls into the snow. He fumbles around for rocks and hurls them hopelessly at the bionics.'}
{3: 'The attacks are, of course, futile. The bionics only stagger for less than a split-second before they continue closing in on Evan.'}
{3: "But that split-second seems to have done the trick. A spear plummets from the sky and pierces a bionic's frame."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Status report! Five bionics upfront, seven to the left! Full force!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guards', 3: 'Status report! Five bionics upfront, seven to the left! Full force! Charge!'}
{3: 'The bionics closest to Evan were suddenly pinned to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Attack formation! Go! Go! Go!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Leading around a dozen Forest Guard Constructs similar to her height and body shape, Rosetta and the others brace their spears and rush the bionics in a V-shaped formation.'}
{3: 'The bionics fall to pieces as they become pierced by the spears.'}
{2: 'Lee, keep an eye out. Liv, go save Evan.', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Lucia and I will protect the right side.', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Gray Raven', 3: 'Roger!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: 'You finally make your way to the frightened Evan after destroying the bionics.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Sigh, why'd you run so far away...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: '...Why did you go running off all by yourself?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Evan', 3: "I... know you won't accept the captain's proposal, Rosetta. But, maybe if you're in a better mood, you might consider it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Evan opens his purple-stained gloves towards you, revealing a lump of something smelling faintly of fruit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Are those... berries?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Evan', 3: "It's the berries that you liked to make tarts with, Rosetta... But I was running too quickly... and smooshed them all together...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta looks at the smooshed berries in Evan's hands, then at him, before hoisting him up on her shoulders."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Let's go pay a visit. Evan's going to make more trouble if we don't.", 4: '1'}
